LanguageData.HuntingForMe_SupervisedHunting.headerTip: Supervised hunting : Predator will hunt only selected preys, if disabled predator will randomly hunt any prey
LanguageData.HuntingForMe_Hunting.headerTip: Allowed hunting : Allow predator to hunt or not
LanguageData.HuntingForMe_HuntingCanAssist.headerTip: Assisted hunting : Predator is allowed to help other predators to hunt
LanguageData.HuntingForMe_PreyModeHunting.headerTip: Secured hunting : Allow predator to hunt preys at same strength or weaker, if disabled predator will hunt stronger preys only if total strength of helping predators is stronger or equal to the prey
